titleStmt.title: Marre Mar-Martin: or Marre-Martins medling, in a manner misliked Martins vaine prose, Marre-Martin doth mislike, reason (forsooth) for Martin seekes debate ... Martin, Marre-Martin, Barrow ioynd with Browne shew zeale: yet striue to pull religion downe.
Mar-Martin.

notesStmt.note: A tract in the Martin Marprelate controversy.
A corrected version of the anonymous "Mar-Martin".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
